name: Len-chan's Lemon Field Plow
description:
I'll plow the lemon field. It's a preparation for the cultivation of lemon.
In the Len-chan's lemon field, let's do a preparation for the cultivation of lemon.

She has finished cleaning the lemon field, so this time let's plow it.
Compete with each other to show which can plow more.

Solo play and multi-player are loaded.
Outdoors everywhere, play BlueTooth multi-player with your friends.
Indoors, play Wi-Fi multi-player with people all over the world.

Easy operation, easy rule, strategy and luck. This includes all the elements to compete.
Probably, it is becoming the standard multi-player game.

The cultivation of lemon with Len-chan and Leo-kun is under way steadily.
